summary: In this documentary, the director follows the day-to-day activities of his mentally ill, middle-aged cousin Philly, over a three-year period.
cast: Philip Wohl|Zero Mostel|Christine O'Connor|Frances Reiss|Ira Wohl|Max Wohl|Pearl Wohl
keywords: jew|aunt nephew relationship|uncle nephew relationship|short attention span|father daughter relationship
title: El mejor de los muchachos
